component.name: Orosound Link
component.summary: Enhance your Tilde® experience with the Orosound Link application

description.p: Orosound Link is an application available on Windows, macOS and Linux for users of the Tilde® headsets. The app notifies you of available firmware updates and lets you perform them in one click, for a constant enhancement of audio experience.

Orosound Link offers a series of parameters directly adjustable in the application, so Tilde® can be personalized to everyone’s needs. The application also brings together all the useful information about the headset: serial number, production lot, Bluetooth name…

You need to easily manage Tilde® headsets for your company? It is possible to configure the Orosound Link application with a channel dedicated to your company, to activate a proxy, or to push firmware updates dedicated to your business.
